forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 21. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 31, with temperatures falling to around 25 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the quiet hours of the night settle over Boston, a soft chill contours the atmosphere, resting somewhere around 21 degrees. The sky wears a gentle veil of partly cloudy fabric, suggesting a stillness that prevails as the city sleeps. Tomorrow promises the warmth of sunshine, heralding a promising transition with highs reaching toward 31 before sliding back to a cool 25 as afternoon approaches. The west winds, though placid now, will stir into a lively dance, gusting with intent and character, a harbinger of brisk and invigorating moments throughout the day.

Upon awakening, one may find it prudent to dress warmly—a layer of knit sweaters, perhaps paired with a timeless scarf or a wool-capped hat to ward off the brisk touch of winter. The clarity of the day will invite you outdoors, so consider a casual stroll along the Charles, where the whisper of the wind mingles with the serene lapping of water against the bank. Alternatively, the brisk air could perfectly complement a visit to one of Boston’s quaint cafes, allowing the warmth of a well-brewed coffee to cradle your hands. The city, crisp and vibrant in its winter attire, awaits your footsteps.
